document_name: Solomon Islands Early Recovery Assistance for April 2014 Floods

outputs.output_descr: The Solomon Islands National capacity is strengthened to integrate and implement policies for preparedness and effective response to disasters

project_descr: A total of USD$500,000 was disbursed from BCPR to assist in the Early Recovery work of UNDP SOI.
project_title: SOI Early Recovery Assistance for April 2014 Floods
